CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 地板；地面；（建筑物内的）场地；（机构、建筑物内的）某一层；（车厢内的）底板；（工资或物价的）最低额；底价；议员席
击倒；使困惑；深深打动；令人震惊；（在辩论、讨论中）使对方无言以对；（车辆）全速行驶；铺设地板（于房间、空地等）

synonym.mean: 地板，地面；楼层；基底；议员席

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 地板；地板材料；室内地面；铺地板
在…上铺地板；击败（floor的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指某一座高层建筑物的某一层。
通常仅用以表示某一建筑的高度。

word_group.brief_definition: 地面以上的一层, 底层
楼层平面图；楼面布置图
发言；长篇大论地发言(尤指使他人无法发言)
底层, 底楼, 一楼

bilingual.source: The toy box is on the floor.
There's an orange rug on the floor.
bilingual.target: 地板上有一块橙色的地毯。

bilingual.source: There are pencils and crayons on the floor.
She was sitting on the floor with her legs crossed.
Then I saw a mobile phone on the floor.
bilingual.target: 然后我在地板上看到了一部手机。

bilingual.source: "There were crumbs on the floor and little bits of icing."
bilingual.target: “地板上有些碎屑和一点糖霜。”

list.abstract: 本词条介绍的floor主要指的是：函数floor和英语单词floor的含义。详细内容见下文。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks. I'll sleep on the floor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢啦，我睡地板就好。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't leave it! You gouged a hole in my dingy floor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么能不管，你在我的旧地板上撬了个洞。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh!? The rain is coming in the house! The floor is getting wet!
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦？！雨水进到房子里了！地板在变湿！

yingyinNormal.en: When did we get a floor safe? When we got the security camera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地板保险箱又什么时候装的？装了监控摄像机之后啊。

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? He's re-tiling my floor. Yo. Spackle boy. Get up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么回事？他在帮我重铺地板。泥水匠，给我起来。

yingyinNormal.en: What's wrong with my bathroom floor? Nothing. It's just old and dingy, that's all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的浴室地板怎么了？没什么，只是又旧又暗.

yingyinNormal.en: When did we get a wall safe? When there was no more room in the floor safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 墙式保险箱什么时候装的？在地板保险箱装满之后啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I didn't, and it's your fault. How? You had the whole floor to yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没睡好，都怪你。这话怎么说，整个地板不都归你了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Our printing presses were in that corner. That's why the floor dips back there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时我们的印刷机在那个角落，所以那儿的地板有些下沉。

yingyinNormal.en: What happened to all your glow in the dark emergency exit stuff you had painted on the floor?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是在地板上画了夜光逃生路线么，怎么没了？

yingyinNormal.en: You know every time I saw you at the theater, your eyes were glued to the floor. Really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次在电影院看到你的时候，你眼睛都死盯着地板。是么？

yingyinNormal.en: The water. There was water on the floor that night. She only saw the basilisk's reflection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是水，那天晚上地板上有水。诺里斯太太是看到蛇怪的倒影。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, we were sitting over there playing on the floor and he grabs the table and he pulls himself up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们坐在那边地板上玩，他抓住了桌子，把自己拉起来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Forget? After I've seen the outline of my brother's body on the floor, you expect me to forget?
yingyinNormal.zh: 忘了？在我看到地板上我弟弟尸体的轮廓之后，你竟然想让我全都忘了？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't get violations. You could eat beans off that floor. But don't, because that'd be a violation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我绝对不会违规，地板干净到豆子都能捡起来吃。别吃喔，否则你就违规了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're kidding. It's a splatter thing. There's a little piece of tape on the floor you're supposed to stand behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你开玩笑吧。会溅上去的，地板上贴了一小段胶带，你得站在胶带后面。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, well, that's okay then. But, okay my towels for instance. I come in to the bathroom here and my towel is not on the floor where keep it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就没关系，像我的浴巾，我走进浴室，我的浴巾却不在地板上。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh Monica, listen, I saw down at the hardware store, they got those designer tiles on sale, if you ever want to redo the bathroom floor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，我在装潢建材店,看到名牌瓷砖在特价,你可以重铺浴室地板。

yingyinNormal.en: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George. Then peppa vacuums the floor. And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，猪爸爸把佩奇和乔治洗干净。佩奇用吸尘器整理好地板。爸爸整理好工具。

yingyinNormal.en: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George. Then peppa vacuums the floor. And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，猪爸爸把佩琪和乔治洗干净。佩琪用吸尘器整理好地板。爸爸整理好工具。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Navy Department moved into the east wing in 1879, where elaborate wall and ceiling senciling and marquetry <highlight>floors</highlight> decorated the office of the Secretary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1879年，海军部搬进了东翼，部长的办公室用精致的墙壁、天花板和镶嵌地板装饰。

examination_example.sentence: His Stone Circle is a perfect ring of purplish rocks from Portishead beach laid out on the gallery <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的作品《石圈》是由来自波蒂谢德海滩的紫色岩石在画廊地板上设计而成的一个完美环形。

sense_info_list.en: the right or opportunity to speak next in debate
knock someone to the ground, especially with a punch
(in a legislative assembly) the part of the house in which members sit and from which they speak
a minimum level of prices or wages
the bottom of the sea, a cave, or an area of land

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地板; 地面; 铺设

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 地板; 地面; 铺设

examination_example.sentence: The extra scrubbing will harm your <highlight>floors</highlight> over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，额外的擦洗会损害你的地板。

examination_example.sentence: These can dent and scratch your <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些会使你的地板出现凹痕和划痕。

examination_example.sentence: Ash covered the marble diamond-patterned <highlight>floor</highlight> and floated in large pools of grey water from the fire hoses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大理石钻石图案的地板上满是灰烬，从消防水管流出来的灰色水塘里漂浮着灰烬。

examination_example.sentence: The entire ground <highlight>floor</highlight> of our cottage was submerged in water, and five of us have been living in a caravan ever since.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们小屋的整个底层都被水淹没了，从那以后，我们五个人就一直住在一个大篷车里。

examination_example.sentence: The ground <highlight>floor</highlight> of their cottage was flooded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们小屋的一楼被水淹了。

examination_example.sentence: I took the subway to Gong's second-<highlight>floor</highlight> office marked with a hand-painted sign.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我乘地铁来到龚的二楼办公室，那里有一个手绘的标志。

sense_info_list.en: the bottom surface of the sea, a forest, a cave, etc

examination_example.sentence: They explored the ocean <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们探索了海底。

examination_example.sentence: It had, apparently, been fished out of existence; and the once mighty Newfoundland fleet now gropes about frantically for crab on the sea <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显然，它已经被捕捞的不存在；曾经强大的纽芬兰舰队现在疯狂地在海底搜寻螃蟹。

sense_info_list.en: a minimum level of prices or wages

examination_example.sentence: Agreement on an international carbon price <highlight>floor</highlight> would be a good starting pointing that process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就国际碳价格底线达成一致将是这一进程的良好开端。

sense_info_list.en: a public space for activities such as dancing and having formal discussions:

examination_example.sentence: She borrowed the principle of efficiency on the factory <highlight>floor</highlight> and applied it to domestic tasks on the kitchen <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她借用了工厂车间的效率原则，并将其应用于厨房车间的内部劳动。

word_usage.usage:
floor表“地面, 地板”时，为可数名词，常以单数形式出现。
示例：他摔在了光秃秃的地板上。
误 He fell onto the bare floors.
正 He fell onto the bare floor.

floor表“楼层”时，为可数名词。表示“在某一层”时，用介词on。
示例：格林先生的办公室在第五层。
误 Mr. Green's office is in the fifth floor.
正 Mr. Green's office is on the fifth floor.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地板; 地面; 铺设

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 一块地板；汽车内的地板

word_family.mean: n. 地面；地板；楼层；同楼层所有房间；发言席；海底；平地；洞底；发言机会

sense_info_list.zh: 地板; 地面; 铺设

examination_example.sentence: There is no point saying you run marathons if you are out of breath arriving at the interview on the second <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你到二楼面试地点时都要上气不接下气，那就别提跑马拉松了。

word_usage.usage:
floor表“地面, 地板”时，为可数名词，常以单数形式出现。
示例：他摔在了光秃秃的地板上。
误 He fell onto the bare floors.
正 He fell onto the bare floor.

floor表“楼层”时，为可数名词。表示“在某一层”时，用介词on。
示例：格林先生的办公室在第五层。
误 Mr. Green's office is in the fifth floor.
正 Mr. Green's office is on the fifth floor.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: So what to do with all those perfectly-good-but-you're-maybe-a-little-sick-of-them clothes piled on your bedroom <highlight>floor</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，如何处理那些堆在你卧室地板上的那些“非常好，但可能有点讨厌它们”的衣服呢？

examination_example.sentence: We had to have a bit of a production line going, making up "tiger milk", washing baby bottles, and cleaning the <highlight>floors</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不得不让生产线运转起来，比如制作“虎奶”、清洗幼崽奶瓶和清洁地板。

examination_example.sentence: The large color decisions in your rooms concern the walls, ceilings, and <highlight>floors</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 房间主色调的选择与墙壁、天花板和地板有关。

examination_example.sentence: So the first thing we did was rent a fantastically expensive sixth-<highlight>floor</highlight> apartment the size of a cupboard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们做的第一件事就是租了一套非常昂贵的六楼公寓，有橱柜那么大。

examination_example.sentence: On the first <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一楼。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of a courtyard room, I'd like a room with a view, preferably on an upper <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想要一个能看到风景的房间，最好是在楼上，而不是院子里的房间。

word_usage.usage:
美国英语和英国英语对楼层的表达有区别：
美国英语：the first (second, third...) floor一(二、三...)楼
英国英语：the ground (first, second..) floor一(二、三…)楼

exam_freq_info.chinese: 地板; 地面; 铺设地面

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 楼层平面图；楼面布置图

examination_example.sentence: Which <highlight>floor</highlight> does the woman live on?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个女人住在几层？

examination_example.sentence: The following pages include a clear <highlight>floor</highlight> plan of the museum and its collections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下几页包括博物馆及其藏品的清晰平面图。

examination_example.sentence: There is a cinema on the twelfth <highlight>floor</highlight> of the shopping center.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 购物中心的十二楼有一家电影院。

sense_info_list.zh: 地板; 地面; 铺设地面

examination_example.sentence: David, could you please sweep the <highlight>floor</highlight> and take out the trash?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫，能请你扫地和倒垃圾吗？

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>floors</highlight> are made from wood from the nearby area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地板是由附近地区的木材制成的。

examination_example.sentence: She put her big brown shopping bag down onto the <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她把她的棕色大购物袋放在地板上。

sense_info_list.en: the bottom of the sea, a cave, or an area of land

examination_example.sentence: Then they found out there was a hole in the <highlight>floor</highlight> of the boat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他们发现船底上有个洞。

examination_example.sentence: Ocean scientists study the chemical make-up of the ocean, weather patterns, the geography of the ocean <highlight>floor</highlight>, and many other areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海洋科学家研究海洋的化学构成、天气模式、海底地理和许多其他领域。

examination_example.sentence: Her ROV can move through water and find plastics on the ocean <highlight>floor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的ROV(遥控无人潜水器)可以在水中移动，并找到海底的塑料。

word_usage.usage:
floor表“地面, 地板”时，为可数名词，常以单数形式出现。
示例：他摔在了光秃秃的地板上。
误 He fell onto the bare floors.
正 He fell onto the bare floor.

floor表“楼层”时，为可数名词。表示“在某一层”时，用介词on。
示例：格林先生的办公室在第五层。
误 Mr. Green's office is in the fifth floor.
正 Mr. Green's office is on the fifth floor.
